• D-Link DWL-650 (rev A-J, and P only. Others, Cardbus)
wi0 at pcmcia0 function 0: D-Link DWL-650 11Mbps WLAN Card, Version 01.02 
1,2,3 rev A / PRISM II - FCC ID: «MXF-WL211F» 
(ODM/OEM == Gemtek WL211F rev 02) Early rev J cards may use same label 

Note: The card in the FCC photos is the rev A card - WL211F rev 02.
Unlike the Intersil reference design, HWB3163, the DWL-650 rev A card has 
a 5 V to 3.3 V LDO regulator on the card and will work with 5 or 3.3 volts.

wi0: using RF:PRISM2 MAC:HFA3841 CARD:HWB3163 rev.A
wi0: Intersil Firmware: Primary (0.3.0), Station (1.7.1)
wi0: 11b rates: 1Mbps 2Mbps 5.5Mbps 11Mbps
